issue.title: [R] Disable auto-cleaning of duckdb tables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14216](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14216). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since the cleaning up can sometimes get duckdb into trouble, we should disable that by default for now.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14216?focusedCommentId=17424192) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11308
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11308>
